original_title: Ty, co w Ostrej świecisz Bramie
overview: Ryszard Malewicz, a young inventor, is out of work. He had been waiting for months for a response from the ministry to which he had sent plans for his invention, an explosive of extraordinary power. Desperate Ryszard is comforted by his mother and his fiancée Maria.
title: Ty, co w Ostrej świecisz Bramie
